Class AudioBook

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class AudioBook
extends AudioElement
implements java.lang.Comparable<AudioBook>
Represents an audio book

    • save

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> save()
      Description copied from interface: AudioToXML
      Puts all the attributes of the class to be saved into an XML file into a map.
      The key should be the name of the attribute.
      The value should be a list of values, or a list of one value if the attribute is not a list itself.
      Specified by:
      save in interface AudioToXML
      Returns:
      the Map created

    • load

      public void load​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> attributes)
      Description copied from interface: AudioToXML
      Given a list of attributes as parameter, stores this attributes in an instance of the class (previously created).
      If the attribute corresponding to a name is only a single value (as opposed to a list), it will appear in the map as a list containing only one element
      Specified by:
      load in interface AudioToXML
      Parameters:
      attributes - a map of all the attributes, mapped by name
